Entries.Title: Changes in version 2.0.0
Entries.Description: Tower Collector now supports Mozilla Location Services project! Share your feedback via Google+ and Facebook communities, email or GitHub issues.
Messages: Added option to contribute to Mozilla Location Services (MLS).
Changed upload progress to report in percentage instead of parts.
Added new languages: Hungarian, Italian and Spanish :)
Added option to clear all data stored locally excluding configuration.
Added display short and long cid for LTE networks.
Added database refresh after import from file - restart no longer needed.
Fixed folder not created when exporting database or preferences to file.
Improved error handling.

Entries.Title: Changes in version 1.22.2
Entries.Description: Do you want to see the app in your language? Help me with translations! some languages are partially done but require volunteers - apply on the website or send me an email to start.
Messages: Fixed measurements not ordered by date in exported JSON file.
Fixed collecting not stopped on low battery on Oreo and newer.
Added 'ocid' suffix to exported CSV file name when using OpenCellID.org formatting.

Entries.Title: Changes in version 1.22.1
Messages: Improved error handling.

Entries.Title: Changes in version 1.22.0
Entries.Description: Do you want to see the app in your language? Help me with translations! some languages are partially done but require volunteers - apply on the website or send me an email to start.
Messages: Added option to stop collector when battery is getting low.
Added collecting measurements when at least one of main cell changes even without move.
Removed option to hide Collector notification on Oreo and newer because Android automatically increases channel importance to DEFAULT level for foreground services. See more.
Fixed exception when logging to file.
Improved compatibility with Android P.
Updated translations and new language - Ukrainian.

Entries.Title: Changes in version 1.21.0
Entries.Description: Do you want to see the app in your language? Help me with translations! Catalan, Dutch, French, Hungarian, Spanish, Swedish are partially done but require volunteers - apply on the website or send me an email to start.
Messages: Fixed export to MLS JSON creating invalid files.
Fixed runtime permissions not checked before import and export of database or preferences.
Added PSC value to exported GPX file.
Improved network exception handling.
